forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: area json export

comments.text: Hi! If you now hit the Export button at the back of the Area dialog (in version 165.11... you're on [version]) ...
... it also exports a JSON file containing e.g. all the placement's positions and rotations.
More on the format at anyland.com/info/area-format.html
Exporting is only available if you're the original area creator, or the area has been set to Copyable. Enjoy & thx all!
And v165.12: When exporting an area, all Thing Jsons are now exported as well into a folder (if you created them or they are clonable)! Thx Liza!

thread.latestCommentText: And v165.12: When exporting an area, all Thing Jsons are now exported as well into a folder (if you created them or they are clonable)! Thx Liza!
